title: Design notes: app locked
body:
## Expected fixes

### Enter password screen

- [ ] Add identicon ring (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429523451))
- [ ] Add accent color (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429517335))
- [ ] Check input top padding (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429504774))
- [ ] Check background(full comment [here][(https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1929:154137#429121577](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429507964))
- [ ] Update design "Forgot password" (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429505201))
- [ ] Update login button design (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429513108))
- [ ] Update "Wrong password"  error design (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429524054) and [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429523918))

### Splash screen
- [ ] Flickering white screen on splash  (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429541716))

### Password validation
- [ ] Add animation on login after tapping on "Login" button (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147125#429541716))
